recipes.label: Make a Determination: Shell Origin
recipes.startdescription: The Carapace Cross are a hybrid race, and once we were the Carapace Cross. From the Seglaz-kind, we inherited what now we call language. We long for what we were; and History too is hybrid. [Adds Scale and Heart to your journal; replaces any other Origin Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Scale History, the First Flower: Black Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Heart History, Oldest: Horned-Axe is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Glorious Origin
recipes.startdescription: Our first sparks of self descended from the light above the world which we call the Glory. Without the Glory, we would be beasts in darkness, and the gifts of our past illuminate our future, which is Eternity [Adds Moth and Lantern to your journal; replaces any other Origin Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering either a Moth or a Lantern History, the Origin: Glorious and Oldest: Moth Determinations are both relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Roots Origin
recipes.startdescription: Our ancestors were born naked in the roots of the Wood. All we ever were has risen from that darkness. With our hands and our mouths we shaped language from mud. With our mouths and our hands we will shape our future. [Adds Nectar and Moon to your journal; replaces any other Origin Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Nectar History, the Oldest: Grail Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Moon History, First Flower: Black is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: From-Nowhere Origin
recipes.startdescription: The Thritige-kind of the Carapace Cross dreamed themselves out of black glass, to be their own Monarch. If we inherit the empty throne, we dream ourselves into every night to come. [Adds Sky and Forge to your journal; replaces any other Origin Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Sky History, Speech the Key is relevant; or if you're considering a Forge History, First Flower: Red is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Speech, the Sword
recipes.startdescription: Language is a weapon. With language, we breached the Mansus; without language, we could not have fought wars; without language, we would still be apes, beetles, stone. [Adds Edge and Grail to your journal; replaces any other Speech Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering an Edge History, the First Flower: White Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Grail History, Oldest: Grail is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Speech, the Key
recipes.startdescription: Language is the key. It was language that opened the doors of the Mansus; without language, we could have had no peace; without language, we would still be beasts, worms, mud. [Adds Rose and Sky to your journal; replaces any other Speech Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Rose History, the First Flower: Red Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Sky History, Origin: From-Nowhere is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Speech, the Wound
recipes.startdescription: Language is a scar. It was language that tore open the Mansus; without language, we could have had no wars; without language, we would still be fire, sky, earth. [Adds Knock and Winter to your journal; replaces any other Speech Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Knock History, the Oldest: Horned-Axe Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Winter History, First Flower: White is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Horned-Axe, Oldest
recipes.startdescription: The Horned-Axe bears two blades; permits passage when passage is to be permitted; waits at the threshold. The Horned-Axe, who forbids contradiction, is the oldest Hour. Other Hours might seem older. They are not older. [Adds Heart and Knock to your journal; replaces any other Oldest Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Heart History, the Origin: Shell Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Knock History, Speech the Wound is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Grail, Oldest
recipes.startdescription: The Red Grail gives life; the Grail takes life; the Grail is not sated. The Grail, who disdains contradiction, is the oldest Hour that persists. Any that seem older are subsumed, eventually, in the Grail's tides. [Adds Grail and Nectar to your journal; replaces any other Oldest Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Grail History, Speech the Sword is relevant; or if you're considering a Nectar History, Origin: Roots is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Moth, Oldest
recipes.startdescription: The Moth beats within the skull; seeks among the trees of the Wood; is dappled. The Moth, who delights in contradiction, is the oldest Hour that remains. Any that seem older, the Moth once was, when once it was. [Adds Moth and Lantern to your journal; replaces any other Oldest Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering either a Moth or a Lantern History, the Origin: Glorious and Oldest: Moth Determinations are both relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Black, the First Flower
recipes.startdescription: The Watchman's Tree is the covenant that forbids knowledge to mortals, but permits it in the covenant-houses of the Tree... like Brancrug Isle.The Black Flower of Calyptra -'the night unwounded' - was its first defence. Forbidden knowledge must not be spoken; must not be written; must not be known. The Tree is rooted in night. [Adds Moon and Scale to your journal; replaces any other First Flower Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Moon History, the Origin: Roots Determination is relevant; or if you're considering a Scale History, Origin: Shell is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: Red, the First Flower
recipes.startdescription: The Watchman's Tree is the covenant that forbids knowledge to mortals, but permits it in the covenant-houses of the Tree... like Brancrug Isle.The Red Flower of Calyptra -'the fire fuelled by truth' was its first defence. Fire consumes knowledge... but fire also gives light. The Tree is rooted in paradox. [Adds Forge and Rose to your journal; replaces any other First Flower Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Forge History, the From-Nowhere Origin is relevant; or if you're considering a Rose History, Speech the Key is relevant.]

recipes.label: Make a Determination: White, the First Flower
recipes.startdescription: The Watchman's Tree is the covenant that forbids knowledge to mortals, but permits it in the covenant-houses of the Tree... like Brancrug Isle. The White Flower of Calyptra - 'the silence that is given' was its first defence. When forbidden knowledge is known, it must be forgotten. But to be forgotten, it must first be known. The Tree is rooted in paradox. [Adds Winter and Edge to your journal; replaces any other First Flower Determination. Adding Determinations to your Journal makes it first possible, then easier, to write a matching History.]
recipes.desc: I am the Librarian of Hush House, and I have made my Determination. [If you're considering a Winter History, Speech the Wound is relevant; or if you're considering an edge History, Speech the Sword is relevant.]
